text: Got it, thanks for the screen shot! That’s helpful. I don’t think this is possible right now (_maybe_ it can be done with custom code?), but I’ll ask around and find out for sure.
Yes, I also think to make this possible using Javascript, but it’s nice to have this this functionality natively
<@UNWHHSWHJ> just confirmed, there’s not a way to do this without custom code :disappointed:
